instructors.name: מר ערן שחם
instructors.description: מנהל בית הספר להייטק וסייבר באוניברסיטת בר-אילן, בעל ניסיון עשיר של למעלה מ-30 שנים כמרצה ומנהל הדרכות בתחום הסייבר ואבטחת המידע, מנהל מרכזי הדרכה מורשים של החברות המובילות בעולם בתחום הווירטואליזציה, תקשורת ואבטחת מידע, יזם, הקים וניהל את קורסי התעודה במחשבים ביחידה ללימודי המשך של 'מוסד הטכניון', הקים וניהל את 'מלם-תים הדרכה', ניהל את קהילת אבטחת המידע במיקרוסופט ישראל.

instructors.name: ד"ר משה יונתני
instructors.description: חבר סגל במרכז האקדמי 'רופין', מרצה מן החוץ בפקולטה לניהול 'אוניברסיטת תל אביב', מרצה מן החוץ בבית הספר ליזמות ב'בין-תחומי הרצליה', מנהל סוכנות לשיווק דיגיטלי, יזם דיגיטלי, מחקרו התמקד בשווקים דיגיטליים.

instructors.name: מר יאיר קורן
instructors.description: מנהל סוכנות לשיווק דיגיטלי, יזם דיגיטלי, בעל ותק של יותר מעשור בשיווק דיגיטלי, העביר מספר הרצאות על Google Ads בקמפוס של גוגל מטעם גוגל ישראל.

instructors.name: מר רוני אפלבוים
instructors.description: מומחה לכתיבה שיווקית, קופירייטר, בוגר משרדי פרסום רבים וטובים, בעל תואר שני בפילוסופיה מ'אוניברסיטת ת"א', מרצה בחוג לתקשורת של 'מכללת עמק יזרעאל' ו'מכללת קריית אונו'.

instructors.name: גב' יעל בן מיור
instructors.description: מומחית לעיצוב חווית משתמש (UI/UX), מעצבת ממשקים, אתרים ואפליקציות, מומחית למיתוג וסטארטאפיסטית.

instructors.name: מר לירן וויס
instructors.description: בעל תואר ראשון ושני במנהל עסקים עם התמחות במימון ומערכות מידע, בעל 15 שנות ניסיון כמנהל פרויקטים בחברות בינלאומיות וניסיון רב בפיננסים.

instructors.name: מר נעם שחם
instructors.description: 10 שנות ניסיון כמנהל קמפיינים בשווקים בינלאומיים ובשוק המקומי, אנליסט לשיפור ביצועים ומכירות באתרים (CRO) ובאפליקציות, מומחה GA בעל ניסיון על GA4.

instructors.name: מר יובל כץ
instructors.description: בעל 20 שנות ניסיון כיזם דיגיטלי, בעלים של חברה גדולה לבניית אתרים, בעלים של תשעה אתרי הכרויות בינלאומיים.

instructors.name: גב' מיטל לויטה
instructors.description: יזמת ומומחית אינסטגרם ורשתות חברתיות, ניסיון רב בשיווק ברשתות חברתיות, כולל בניית מותגים סטרטאפים ואיקומרס.

instructors.name: גב' אליענה אדלר
instructors.description: ניסיון רב בשיווק חברות הייטק ובתקציבים גבוהים, מנהלת קמפיינים בחברת monday.com, ניהלה קמפיינים בחברת Lightricks.

summary: The Digital Marketing Professional course is designed to train individuals in digital marketing with a focus on startups, AI tools, and digital entrepreneurship. The course covers essential skills for marketing in the digital age, including the use of advanced technological tools, understanding AI's impact on marketing, and practical applications in content creation, website development, and social media marketing. Graduates will be prepared to take the Google Ads international certification exam and will receive prestigious certificates from Bar-Ilan University. The program emphasizes practical training, real-world digital activities, and personal guidance to tailor learning to organizational needs. The course is suitable for marketing professionals, business owners, and those seeking career changes or additional income opportunities.
full_text:
COURSE NAME: Digital Marketing Professional

COURSE OVERVIEW: The complete program for training digital marketing professionals with a specialization in startup marketing, AI tools, and digital entrepreneurship. Digital marketing is an integral part of the high-tech world. Today, every organization or entrepreneur must be familiar with various digital platforms and learn how to operate within them to promote themselves and their organization. The ability to market businesses domestically and internationally is essential for anyone looking to develop a new venture and serves as a stepping stone to working in high-tech. Familiarity with the digital marketing content world is crucial today for employees in marketing and advertising, marketing managers, sales managers, CEOs, and entrepreneurs. The field of digital marketing evolves daily, just like the technological fields in high-tech, and offers great satisfaction in the process of improving organizations' business results. Program graduates will be able to take the international Google Ads exam and embark on a new, interesting, and challenging path in the world of digital marketing.

COURSE LEADERSHIP: The program is led by Mr. Eran Shacham, Director of the School of Hi-Tech and Cyber Security at Bar-Ilan University. Professional advisors include Dr. Moshe Yonatani and Mr. Yair Koren.

COURSE SCHEDULE: 
- Start Date: 12.12.2024
- Duration: Approximately six months
- Schedule: Mondays and Thursdays from 17:30 to 21:30
- Total Academic Hours: 200 frontal learning hours

LEARNING FORMAT: 
- Location: School of Hi-Tech and Cyber Security, Bar-Ilan University Campus, Ramat Gan
- Online: Simultaneously available online with recorded lessons
- Multimedia systems in all classrooms
- Some lessons may be conducted via Zoom

TUITION AND FEES: 
- Registration Fee: 480 ₪
- Tuition Fee: 12,500 ₪
- International certification exam fee is separate

COURSE TOPICS: 
- Introduction to Digital Marketing and Strategic Marketing Plan (5 hours)
  - Understanding digital marketing terminology
  - Developing a marketing plan for a business/company
  - Competitor research
  - Target audience research
  - Setting goals and objectives using digital tools
  - Conducting market research with AI tools

- Marketing Writing (20 hours)
  - Identifying customer needs
  - Motivating customer action in the digital world
  - Writing that generates response
  - Using AI tools for creating action-driven marketing content

- Building WordPress and Wix Websites (15 hours)
  - Website specification
  - Introduction to WordPress and Wix
  - Differences between open and closed code
  - Overview of popular systems in closed and open code
  - Building a basic landing page in WordPress
  - Building a WordPress showcase site
  - Building a basic e-commerce site in WordPress
  - Principles for creating a high-conversion landing page

- Organic Search Engine Advertising (30 hours)
  - Understanding Google's algorithm
  - Keyword research and proper use of technology
  - Organic and paid advertising
  - Key principles for organic promotion on Google
  - Main tools for organic promotion on Google
  - Techniques for promoting a site to the first place on Google
  - Google My Business
  - Google Play, ASO application promotion
  - Google Search Console
  - YouTube promotion
  - Working with suppliers in the field
  - Using AI tools for content creation and competitor research

- Paid Search Engine Advertising (35 hours)
  - Options for paid advertising on Google
  - Differences between paid and organic keyword research
  - Key principles for paid promotion on Google
  - Building a basic campaign
  - Building an advanced campaign in search, media, shopping, and YouTube
  - Differences between AI Performance Max campaigns and regular campaigns
  - Integrating AI features in regular campaigns
  - Key points for campaign optimization in Google Ads
  - Working with suppliers in the field
  - Preparing for Google certification exams

- Social Media Advertising (30 hours)
  - Introduction to the world of social networks
  - Choosing the relevant social network for my business and understanding the differences between networks
  - Options for paid advertising on social networks
  - Organic vs. paid advertising
  - Building a basic campaign on Facebook/Instagram
  - Building an advanced campaign on Facebook/Instagram, leads, conversions, traffic, engagement, exposures, messages
  - Building a campaign on TikTok
  - AI campaign options on Facebook/Instagram and AI campaign on TikTok
  - Building a complex marketing funnel between organic and paid
  - Key points for campaign optimization in Facebook Ads
  - Working with suppliers in the field

- Pixel and Conversion Workshop (5 hours)
  - What is a pixel
  - Importance in measuring conversions
  - Advanced options for improving and tracking campaigns
  - Introduction to Google Tag Manager

- B2B Advertising and Employer Branding (10 hours)
  - Building a network on LinkedIn
  - Various advertising options on LinkedIn (organic, paid, bots, LinkedIn's dedicated tools)
  - Building a paid campaign on LinkedIn
  - Introduction to employer branding
  - Using digital marketing for recruiting new employees to the organization

- Content Marketing and Content Distribution Tools (10 hours)
  - Building a campaign on Taboola and Outbrain
  - Optimization of content-based campaigns
  - Building a combined content/search engine and social network funnel
  - UX/UI user experience workshop

- Optimization and Marketing Automation (20 hours)
  - Tools for optimization in digital marketing
  - Working with Google Analytics to improve marketing performance in the company
  - Heat maps
  - Basic marketing automation tools
  - Working with bots on social networks

- Digital Entrepreneurship and E-commerce Platforms (20 hours)
  - Introduction to various e-commerce platforms
  - Using digital assets
  - Building a digital asset and familiarizing with many examples from the field
  - Guest lecture with an entrepreneur and owner of numerous digital assets
  - Summary and presentation of projects

- Final Project
  - Building a WordPress showcase site
  - Promoting the site on 5 different keywords to the first page on Google
  - Building a site as part of a student SEO competition
  - Creating organic content for site marketing
  - Setting up campaigns in Google Ads (search network, media network, YouTube, shopping)
  - Setting up campaigns in Taboola and Outbrain
  - Setting up campaigns on LinkedIn
  - Building a LinkedIn profile
  - Setting up a business page on Facebook
  - Setting up an Instagram channel
  - Opening Google My Business
  - Data analysis in Google Analytics
  - Building an advanced marketing plan including a complex marketing funnel
  - Using AI tools for marketing activities

REGISTRATION AND CONTACT INFORMATION: 
- Main Office: 03-5318254
- Designated Programs Department: 03-5317957
- Security Forces Department: 03-5317005/6
- Pre-Academic Preparatory Program: 03-5317956
- Haredi Campus: 077-2753094/8
- Certificate Studies: 03-7384481
- Dedicated Programs System: biu-es.ac.il

INSTITUTIONAL INFORMATION: The Center for Designated Programs at the School of Hi-Tech and Cyber Security, Bar-Ilan University.
